Alfred 3 workflow developmenthttp://blog.test:8888/2018/06/alfred-3-workflow-development/Thu, 28 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://blog.test:8888/2018/06/alfred-3-workflow-development/The free app Alfred is extremely popular and well-known to a lot of Mac users as a simple but powerful tool for automating task/app launching and many others. Since version 3, Alfred has been revamped with even more cool interfaces and features and good integrations with numerous third-party applications. The most amazing element of Alfred is workflow , which is included in the paid version called Powerpack. Simply speaking, a workflow allows one to extend Alfred with new functionality.
